content: description toss on this colorful and oversized retro style tee this summer the open stitches make this breezy tee perfect to use as a poolside cover up or to just pair with your favorite shorts the bright colors and stripes make the texture pop this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is a lion brand kit 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your top + the pattern you can even customize your yarn color this pattern has a full video tutorial 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-electric-sun-tee-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3j2c9 3 https //youtu be/cldx-ud08du
